hymn.title: Jesus from the tomb has come

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus from the tomb has come, Death to Him could do no harm; Com -- fort -- ed let us re -- main, And to -- geth -- er praise His name. Now re -- demp -- tion's work is done, All His foes He's o -- ver -- come. Once for all our sins He bore, Now He'll suf -- fer nev -- er -- more.

lyrics.stanza: Jesus from the tomb has come, Death to Him could do no harm; Comforted let us remain, And together praise His name. Now redemption's work is done, All His foes He's overcome. Once for all our sins He bore, Now He'll suffer nevermore.

Hades, boulder, soldiers 'round, None could harm or hold Him down; Though He briefly suffered pain, I eternal blessing gain. He Who died must die no more, Satan's scheming days are o'er; Empty tomb is all we see, Soon all graves shall empty be.

From the grain of wheat that died, Many grains were multiplied; He no more alone abides, All the church is at His side. As His Body, with our Head, To the heavens we ascend; With Him buried, with Him soar, Praise His name forevermore.
